Subject: The last clone...and what a clone it is!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Inferno, and his blue buddies, held a strong position behinde a large 
pile of boulders that had come from the fallen cave. They let loose random 
shots, mostly at the lavacins, and a few at Starscream.
    "Royalty! The invaders have spotted us and opened fire! And there 
reinforcements are on the way!" Inferno cried, and the looked to see one of 
the blue clones burst in an eruption of fire. That was one soldier dead.

    Megatron laughed, "Inferno, keep them busy. We have other plans....yes." 
He said and then broke the connection before a trace could be done. 
Waspinator laughed to as they glanced over to the table and saw the clone of 
Megatron leap up in pure fustration.
    "What is the meaning of this?" The clone barked, just like Megatron. He 
was a replica of the tyrant...except for his blue eyes. That damn 
pigmintation was a hard problem to solve. With the slaming of his body, he 
had broken the cloning data input. That was the end of the clones......
    Megatron smiled, "You have a mission to do. Once they kill you they wont 
worry about me anymore. Youre my scapegoat." He then pointed to a control 
that Waspinator held. The insect pushed it and the clone went into a zombie 
like state.
    "Now....go to the battle and relive Inferno and the remaining clones. 
You, on the other hand, are to fight until your certian death. Understood?" 
He commanded, and the clone gave a blank nod, turned, and exited.
    "Excellent. Good thing we cloned Inferno first, I think a large blue 
clone of myself would give my plan away a bit to quickly." Megatron laughed. 
He then turned to the broken cloning station and sighed. It was good while it 
lasted. This last ditch effort should prove effective, well, it would have to 
be because he couldnt clone anymore.
